paper_abstract: Taking both white noise and colored environmental noise into account, a general stochastic logistic model under regime switching is proposed and studied. Sufficient conditions for extinction, nonpersistence in the mean, weak persistence, stochastic permanence and global attractivity are established. The critical number between weak persistence and extinction is obtained. Moreover, some simulation figures are introduced to illustrate the main results. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Asymptotic properties and simulations of a stochastic logistic model under regime switching
